title: Generative AI and Responsible Management Education: Ethical Decision-Making Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Application of autonomy-based pedagogy in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments to cultivate generative AI tool usage and ethical business decision-making skills

learning_goals: Learners can explain the fundamental principles of generative AI tools and their applications in education/business domains
Learners can evaluate AI-driven decision-making using an ethical framework based on Kohlberg’s moral development theory
Learners can responsibly utilize generative AI in project-based assessments to formulate sustainable business strategies

resources: Generative AI Tool Mobile App for Hands-on Experience
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
